definition: Lintong District of Xi’an 西安市[Xi1 an1 Shi4], Shaanxi
to face/to overlook/to arrive/to be (just) about to/just before
high/name of a pass
Lintong District of Xi’an 西安市[Xi1 an1 Shi4], Shaanxi

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effect of Lintong spa on some chemical elements in human body.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究臨潼礦泉對人體某些化學成分的影響。

sentences.english: Moreover, the calculated result of monitoring data is given for horizontal deformation monitoring net in Lintong region.
sentences.chinese: 並給出了對臨潼水平形變同監測資料的試算結果。

sentences.english: Lintong farmers found the Terracotta Warriors in Shanxi.
sentences.chinese: 陝西臨潼農民發現秦始皇兵馬俑。

sentences.english: Situated in Xiahe Village, which is 5 kilometres east of Lingtong County, Xi'an City.
sentences.chinese: 位於西安市臨潼縣東5公里的下河村。

sentences.english: The on-site museum is located five kilometres east of Xi'an,in Lintong County.
sentences.chinese: 這座遺址性博物館位於先臨潼區以東5千米處。

sentences.english: This is the Terracotta Warriors located in Lin Tong County, Xi'an City, Shaanxi Province, China.
sentences.chinese: 這就是位於中國陝西省西安市臨潼縣的秦始皇兵馬俑。

sentences.english: Qinshihuang's Mausoleum is located in Lintong District, 35 kilometers east of Xi'an, capital of Shanxi Province.
sentences.chinese: 秦始皇陵位於陝西省西安市以東35公里的臨潼區。
臨潼石榴，你真的喫到了嗎？
